description: These emoji dogs have big floppy ears, which is a classic, snuggly puppy look! These definitely have to be hounds! The big floppy ears are usually made with a capital U. Only some of these dogs have heads made using ( brackets ), and if they do, be sure to put the floppy ears inside the head rather than on the outside.  ∪･ω･∪ (U・x・U) ┌U･ｪ･U┘ ｏ（Ｕ・ω・）⊃ U ´꓃ ` U U・♀・U U｡･ｪ･｡U U＾ェ＾U Ｕ^皿^Ｕ U￣ｰ￣U Uo･ｪ･oU ＵＴｪＴＵ (U •́ .̫ •̀ U) (꒪ω꒪υ) (υ◉ω◉υ) Uo-ｪ-oU (Ｕ◕ฺ㉨◕ฺ)ノ (υŏᆺŏυ) ヽUﾟ●_ﾟ*Uﾉ U｡-ｪ-｡U。 u(´Д`u) (Ｕ^ω^) (∪＾ω＾) ♪o(･x･o∪ ∪o･x･)o♪ .+:｡ヽUﾟДﾟUﾉﾟ.+:｡
title: Big Floppy Ears
